actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to eliminate the assessment of certain fees assessed by the Secretary of the Interior in connection with the probate of estates of Indians.

summary.text: Eliminates the assessment of fees by the Secretary of the Interior for determining heirship of deceased members of the Five Civilized Tribes of Oklahoma and certain other Indians.

titles.title: A bill to eliminate the assessment of certain fees assessed by the Secretary of the Interior in connection with the probate of estates of Indians.
